channel.title: PK Microcomputer Measurement and Control Screen on Linyi Senkuo Electromechanical Co. Ltd
channel.description: Recent content in PK Microcomputer Measurement and Control Screen on Linyi Senkuo Electromechanical Co. Ltd

item.title: GZDW-Intelligent-High-Frequency-DC-Control-Panel
item.description: PK series microcomputer protection measurement and control panels are used in substation distribution substations with voltage levels of 35KV and below. Provide intelligent and networked measurement, protection and control functions for each high-voltage equipment in the station, and at the same time communicate with the upper master station in real time to realize the comprehensive automation of the substation distribution station.
